title: New: GBSmith – Blood
content: As far as I can gather, GBSmith aka George Brooke-Smith is eighteen years old, and having listened to his music, you may this rather hard to believe. His eloquent lyrics and handsome vocals display a maturity far beyond his tender age, yet it’s his partially his inexperience that makes Blood such a vividly engaging listen. ‘I like the girls with the blue eyes and the brown stare’ laments Smith with such an admirable honesty, scarcely found in modern music. Entirely acoustic, Blood excels upon it’s minimal albeit all-encompassing feel, drawing the listener in and then breaking their heart. Check out Blood below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
